price: 16. De boodschappers zeiden: “Onze Heer weet dat wij als boodschappers tot jullie zijn gestuurd, -
arabic: قَالُواْ رَبُّنَا يَعۡلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qālū rabbunā yaʿlamu innā ilaykum lamur'salūna
